name: Another Sonic 2 Remake
storyline: Sonic has arrived back on South Island after his last adventure, and he arrives to see that his friend, Miles "Tails" Prower has been kidnapped by Dr Eggman right before his very eyes. Sonic gives chase until he ends up in the previously unexplored "North East Island", where Eggman has set up base. If Sonic ever wants to his his friend again, Sonic must deliver the 6 Chaos Emeralds to Dr Eggman at his base inside the Gimmick Mountain. Along the way Sonic must battle powerful and smart new Master Robots, whom are all based on animals. What exactly is Eggman testing here?
summary:
A hand drawn fan remake of the Master System and Game Gear version of Sonic 2. Currently playable as a 7 level demo with multiple difficulty modes, a boss rush, and a time attack. Debuted at the Sonic Amateur games Expo 2022, the final game is expected to release by 2029.

The game is powered by the open source "Open Surge" Engine and is developed by Just John 43, with an OST selected from across the Sonic community.
